description: Ensure user and group configurations are secure

controls.title: Ensure accounts in /etc/passwd use shadowed passwords
controls.description: Passwords should be stored in /etc/shadow, not /etc/passwd
controls.remediation: Run: pwconv to move passwords to shadow file

controls.title: Ensure /etc/shadow password fields are not empty
controls.description: All accounts must have passwords or be locked
controls.remediation: Lock accounts with empty passwords: passwd -l <username>

controls.title: Ensure all groups in /etc/passwd exist in /etc/group
controls.description: Groups referenced in /etc/passwd must exist in /etc/group
controls.remediation: Add missing groups to /etc/group or fix user GIDs

controls.title: Ensure no duplicate UIDs exist
controls.description: Duplicate UIDs can cause security issues
controls.remediation: Change duplicate UIDs to unique values

controls.title: Ensure no duplicate GIDs exist
controls.description: Duplicate GIDs can cause security issues
controls.remediation: Change duplicate GIDs to unique values

controls.title: Ensure no duplicate user names exist
Ensure no duplicate group names exist
controls.description: Duplicate group names can cause confusion
controls.remediation: Remove or rename duplicate group names

controls.title: Ensure root PATH Integrity
controls.description: The root user PATH should not include current directory or writable directories
controls.remediation: Remove . and writable directories from root PATH

controls.title: Ensure all users' home directories exist
controls.description: Users should have valid home directories
controls.remediation: Create missing home directories or update /etc/passwd

controls.title: Ensure users own their home directories
controls.description: Users should own their home directories
